item.title: TMC - Defects -other CW6 problem, 9th May
item.description:
NWD WITH GIVE AN TAKE PLEASE BRING X2 UNEVEN FOOTWAY BOARDS AND X2 SANDBAGS OUT OUT AN PLACE IN FOOTWAY AS MARKED WITH WHITE PAINT (CW6 Abrupt Level Differences )

item.title: Lampost and tree damaged, 9th May
item.description:
Ivy has overgrown so badly it is pulling over the lampost and tree with it. Very unstable and unsafe. Could fall and hurt someone, then obstruct path. Ivy and roots damaged fencing of Number 7, having had to recently do full repair.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Denbigh Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overhanging trees low branches in Kayte Lane, 9th May
item.description:
Low branches when turning left from Southam Lane into Kayte Lane.School buses diverted route due to New Road closure. high risk of damaged top deck windows.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kayte Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other problem, 9th May
item.description:
Fw obstruction by vegetation Cycle lane needs clearing and cutting back to boundary Approx 60mtrs length Fw closure (Debris/Obstruction in CW)

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 9th May
item.description:
Tree stump has been here for over a year and the footway has been blocked for the entirity of the time. When will the stump be removed and the footway cleared for pedestrians?
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 9th May
item.description:
